html.DT_OD_BYOD_SECUREPIN_INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Select the number where we can text you the Online Authorization Code.
  2. Click text me the code (this message is free and you will not be billed for this text message)
    • You should receive your code in less than a minute.
  3. On the next page you will need to enter your Online Authorization Code and click Confirm.

label.DT_OD_BYOD_GET_STARTED: Let's get started by checking your old device.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_DEVICE_ID_DESCRIPTION: We'll need your device ID to see if it's compatible with the Verizon network.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_DONT_FIND_DEVICE_TITLE: if you couldn't find your device above, just give us your device id.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_PERSONALIZED_INSTRUCTION: Click one of the device types below for personalized instructions.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_CHECKED_DEVICE_DESCRIPTION: Devices you wanted to bring will show up here.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_CHECKED_DEVICE_ERROR: The device ID you entered is not valid. Please try again and ensure that there are no spaces or specified characters.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_DEVICE_SUCCESS_TEXT: Congratulations! Your device works on the Verizon Wireless network.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_SIM_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Your device also requires a SIM card. We would be happy to send you a new SIM card for free, or you can check if your current card already works with our network.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_HAVE_SIM_DESCRIPTION: Check your SIM card ID below to see if it's compatible with our network.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_ORDER_NEW_SIM: If you don't have a SIM card, or it isn't compatible, just order a free one here.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_SIM_TITLE: Awesome, your $DEVICENAME$ is a perfect match for our network.
label.DT_OD_FIND_SIM_INSTRUCTION_TOP: To find your SIM ID, please follow the instructions below.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_SIM_ID_ADDED_TITLE: A SIM card has been added to your order.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_SIM_ID_ADDED_DESCRIPTION: You'll now be able to use your current device on Verizon's network.
label.DT_OD_BYOD_WHAT_NEXT_TEXT: What would you like to to do next?
label.DT_OD_BYOD_ADD_TO_CART_DESCRIPTION: You can add your current devices to cart and checkout, add more devices to your order or shop for new devices below.
